dc_title_s: Die erst general Tafel die Beschreibung und den Circkel des gantzen Erdtrichs und Meers innhaltende
dc_description_s: Oval map within illustrated border.; Appears in Sebastian Münster's Cosmografia (published circa 1588).; Prime meridian: Ferro.; Includes text.; Text and illustration on verso.|30 x 35 centimeters, on sheet 34 x 36|Scale approximately 1:120,000,000 At equator|General Map Collection
